message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I understand that $140 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and offer it to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $150. Would you be willing to meet me at $145?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're getting close to your target price, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go below $160. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $155. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
